sqlMap.statement: SELECT UP_TAB_NM FROM UP_TAB TAB WHERE TAB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TAB.BIZ_APP_ID = #BIZ_APP_ID# AND TAB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT PRC.MENU_PROC_ID AS MENU_PROC_ID FROM MENU_PROC_GRP GRP ,MENU_PROC_RELN PRE ,MENU_PROC PRC ,UP_TAB_RELN REL ,UP_TAB TAB WHERE GRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD = #MENU_PROC_GRP_CD# AND GRP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRE.GLBL_CMPY_CD_G0 = GRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRE.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD = GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD AND PRE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRE.GLBL_CMPY_CD_P0 AND PRC.MENU_PROC_ID = PRE.MENU_PROC_ID AND PRC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_P0 = PRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND REL.MENU_PROC_ID = PRC.MENU_PROC_ID AND REL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TAB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_T0 AND TAB.UP_TAB_CD = REL.UP_TAB_CD AND TAB.BIZ_APP_ID = #BIZ_APP_ID# AND TAB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
